buddySelection.subtitle: Pick a companion for your journey
buddySelection.title: Choose your buddy

calmPower.achievementDescription: You completed 10 days of mindful meditation with music to manage cravings.
buddyAdvice: If your mind wanders, gently bring attention back to your breath.
Repeat daily for 10 days.
Repeat each time a craving arises.
Sit comfortably and close your eyes.
Take slow, deep breaths and focus on the sensations.
calmPower.longDescription: Practice 2 minutes of meditation to manage cravings.
calmPower.title: Calm power

craveCrusher.achievementDescription: You drew or wrote your cravings and crushed them for 10 days.
buddyAdvice: Crumple the paper into a ball.
Focus on the feeling as you create it.
Repeat whenever cravings arise.
Take a deep breath and let it go.
Take a piece of paper and draw your craving for a cigarette or write it down.
craveCrusher.longDescription: Draw or write your craving on paper, then crumple it up to release it.
motivation: Helps you acknowledge and release cravings.
Provides a physical outlet for emotions.
craveCrusher.title: Crave crusher

fistFlow.achievementDescription: You squeezed and released your fists for 10 days to beat cravings.
buddyAdvice: Breathe deeply and relax.
Focus on the sensations in your hands and arms.
Make a fist and squeeze tightly 20 times.
Repeat daily for 10 days.
Repeat whenever cravings arise.
fistFlow.longDescription: Squeeze your fists 20 times to release tension and cravings.
fistFlow.title: Fist flow

flowMinute.achievementDescription: You stretched and released tension for 10 days.
buddyAdvice: Breathe deeply and feel the tension release.
Repeat daily for 10 days.
Repeat whenever you feel tight or stressed.
Sit or stand comfortably.
Slowly stretch your neck, shoulders, and back for 2–3 minutes.
flowMinute.longDescription: Do gentle stretching for 1 minute to release tension and stress.
flowMinute.title: Flow minute

hydrationBoost.achievementDescription: Drink a glass of water in mindful sips, feeling each one.
buddyAdvice: If the craving returns — repeat the steps.
Repeat daily for 10 days.
Replace the craving with a glass of water.
Slowly drink the water, focusing on the taste and sensations.
Take a few deep breaths and relax.
hydrationBoost.longDescription: Drink a glass of water each time you feel a craving.
motivation: Helps flush toxins from your body.
hydrationBoost.title: Hydration boost

masterOfAir.achievementDescription: You completed 10 days of mindful breathing and beat cravings with calm.
buddyAdvice: Do this daily for 10 days.
Focus on the sensations of your breathing.
Repeat 5 times.
Take a slow, deep inhale and exhale.
masterOfAir.longDescription: Practice 5 deep breaths, three times a day for 10 days.
masterOfAir.title: Master of air

refresh.achievementDescription: You completed 10 days of instant cold-water resets instead of cravings.
buddyAdvice: Repeat daily for 10 days.
Repeat if cravings return.
Splash cold water on your face or wrists.
Take a deep breath and relax.
refresh.longDescription: Splash cold water on your face to instantly reset and curb cravings.
refresh.title: Refresh

snackBreak.achievementDescription: You stayed smoke-free for 10 days by choosing healthy bites over cigarettes.
buddyAdvice: If craving returns — repeat the step.
Keep fruits, nuts, or veggies nearby.
Pair the snack with a glass of water.
Repeat daily for 10 days.
When the urge hits — chew slowly, focus on taste and texture.
snackBreak.longDescription: Choose healthy snacks over cigarettes when cravings hit.
motivation: Keeps your mouth and hands busy.
snackBreak.title: Snack break

stepSlayer.achievementDescription: You stayed smoke-free and strong with 10 days of mindful steps.
buddyAdvice: Focus on your breath and steps.
If the craving returns — walk again.
Repeat daily for 10 days.
Take short mindful walks instead of smoking.
Use it as a mini-break to refresh your mind.
stepSlayer.longDescription: Take a short walk of 500 steps whenever you feel a craving.
stepSlayer.title: Step slayer

cancelAlert.message: The challenge will stop and its progress will be lost. You can start this challenge again or choose any other challenge.
cancelAlert.title: Are you sure?

snackBreak.description: Choose healthy snacks over junk food.
snackBreak.title: Snack break

challengeStart.mainSubtitle: Your smoke-free journey begins now. Let's make it count!

coinModal.subtitle: Choose your pack and keep going!
coinModal.title: Get More Coins

crumpleCravings.description: When you feel the urge to smoke, draw or write your craving on a piece of paper. Focus on the feeling, then crumple the paper. Breathe deeply and let the craving go. If it comes back, repeat the steps.
crumpleCravings.title: Crumple cravings

dontGiveUp.description: You slipped and had a cigarette — and that's okay. Take a deep breath, remind yourself why you started, and get back on track. Every craving you resist is progress.
dontGiveUp.title: Don't give up

gripRelease.description: When you feel the urge to smoke, squeeze your fists 20 times. Focus on the sensations, breathe deeply, and let the urge pass. Repeat if needed.
gripRelease.title: Grip and release

meditateListen.description: Replace a craving with a short meditation and music. Focus on your breathing, relax your body, and let the craving pass.
meditateListen.title: Meditate and listen

modal.subtitle: Use breathing exercises or quick tips
modal.title: Want to smoke?

sipBreathe.description: Replace the craving with a glass of water. Slowly drink the water, focusing on the taste and sensations. Take a few deep breaths and relax. If the craving returns — repeat the steps.
sipBreathe.title: Sip and breathe

snackInstead.description: When you feel the urge to smoke, grab a healthy snack instead. Chew slowly, focus on the taste and texture, and take a sip of water. If the craving comes back, repeat the steps.
snackInstead.title: Snack instead

splashRefresh.description: When you feel the urge to smoke, splash cold water on your face or wrists. Breathe deeply, focus on the sensations, and let your body refresh. If the craving returns, repeat the steps.
splashRefresh.title: Splash and refresh

stretchRelax.description: When you feel tension or stiffness, gently stretch your neck, shoulders, and back for 2-3 minutes. Breathe deeply, focus on the sensations, and let your body relax. If tension returns, repeat the steps.
stretchRelax.title: Stretch and relax

walkReset.description: When you feel the urge to smoke, walk 500 steps to clear your mind and reset your body. This helps distract you from cravings and feel in control.
walkReset.title: Walk to reset

breatheDeep.description: Practice 5 deep breaths, three times a day for 10 days. Focus on your breathing, relax your body, and let cravings pass naturally.
breatheDeep.title: Breathe deep

denied.message: You can enable notifications later in your device settings.
denied.title: Permission Denied

error.message: There was an error requesting notification permission.
error.title: Error

notificationPermission.mainSubtitle: Let buddy nudge you with chill reminders — no pressure, just progress.

preview.message: The memory lives on, but tobacco is in the past.
preview.title: 30 days smoke-free.

notificationPermission.subtitle: Get gentle reminders and celebrate your progress

success.message: You will now receive helpful notifications to support your journey!
success.title: Permission Granted

notificationPermission.title: Stay motivated

champion.name: Champion

divine.name: Divine

eternal.description: Twenty-five years smoke-free — your legacy is eternal
eternal.name: Eternal

first-spark.description: Complete your first day without smoking
first-spark.name: First Spark

freedom.description: Achieve six months of smoke-free living
freedom.name: Freedom

guardian.description: Fifteen years smoke-free — guardian of your health
guardian.name: Guardian

hold-on.description: Survive the first week of your quit journey
hold-on.name: Hold On

immortal.description: Ten years without nicotine — you are immortal
immortal.name: Immortal

legend.description: Maintain two years of smoke-free life
legend.name: Legend

master.description: One year smoke-free — you are a true master of self-control

phoenix.description: Seven years smoke-free — risen from the ashes stronger
phoenix.name: Phoenix

sage.description: Five years without smoking — wisdom comes with time
sage.name: Sage

sovereign.description: Twenty years without smoking — sovereign of your destiny
sovereign.name: Sovereign

warrior.description: Three years smoke-free — a warrior against addiction
warrior.name: Warrior

slipConfirmation.description: Had a slip? No worries. Take a breath and keep moving forward.
slipConfirmation.title: Don't give up

slipsLog.summary: You have {{remaining}} slips allowed. If you reach the limit, your smoke-free timer resets — and you can start fresh

welcome.description: Join thousands of people who have successfully quit smoking with our proven approach.
welcome.subtitle: Your journey to a smoke-free life starts here
welcome.title: Welcome to Zero Poofs

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long

chat.title: Chat Assistant
chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm here to help you on your quitting journey. How are you feeling today?

quickReplyOptions.celebrate: I want to celebrate my progress

responses.stressed: I understand stress can be challenging. Remember, smoking won't solve the problem. Try taking a few deep breaths or going for a short walk. What's causing you stress right now?
responses.craving: Cravings are temporary and will pass. Try the 4-4-4 breathing technique: inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4, exhale for 4. You're stronger than this urge!
responses.motivation: You're doing amazing! Every smoke-free moment is a victory. Think about why you started this journey. Your health, your family, your future self - they're all cheering you on!
responses.celebrate: That's fantastic! Celebrating your progress is so important. What milestone are you celebrating? Remember, every day smoke-free is a huge achievement!
responses.default: Thank you for sharing that with me. I'm here to support you through every step of your quitting journey. How can I help you today?

breathe.title: Take a Deep Breath
breathe.description: Inhale slowly for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale for 4

water.title: Drink Some Water
water.description: Stay hydrated and give your mouth something to do

walk.title: Take a Walk
walk.description: Get moving and change your environment

friend.title: Call a Friend
friend.description: Reach out to someone who supports your journey

encourage.title: You're Doing Great!
encourage.description: The craving will pass. You're stronger than this urge.
